          <title>
            <string language="en">Ionisation of phenol in water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ionisierung des Phenols im Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ionisation du phénol dans l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ionisation do phenol na água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ionizzazione del fenolo in acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιονισμός της φαινόλης στο ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ionización del fenol en agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the ionisation of phenol in water where the O-H bond breaks producing a hydrogen ion and a negative phenoxide ion.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acidity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen ion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative phenoxide ion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">O-H bond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phenol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solubility</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weak acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Ionisierung des Phenols
im Wasser, in dem die OH- Bindung das Produzieren eines 
Wasserstoffions und des negativen phenoxide Ions bricht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'ionisation du phénol
dans l'eau où l'obligation de l'OH casse produire un ion 
d'hydrogène et un ion négatif de phenoxide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o ionisation do phenol 
na água onde a ligação do O-H quebra produzir um íon de 
hidrogênio e um íon negativo do phenoxide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la ionizzazione del 
fenolo in acqua in cui il legame dell'OH rompe produrre uno ione di 
idrogeno e uno ione negativo di phenoxide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τον ιονισμό της φαινόλης 
στο ύδωρ όπου τα σπασίματα δεσμών OH παράγοντας ένα ιόν 
υδρογόνου και ένα αρνητικό ιόν phenoxide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ionización del fenol
en el agua donde el enlace del O-H rompe producir un ion de hidrógeno
y un ion negativo del phenoxide.</string>
          </description>
